scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules dist tmp && npm cache clean
scripts.prepare-mobile: mkdirp dist/mobile/www && ncp dist/web dist/mobile/www && ncp build-assets/mobile dist/mobile
scripts.build-mobile: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && cd ../.. && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cd dist/mobile cordova build && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile-ios: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare ios && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build ios && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile-android: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare android && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build android && cd ../..
scripts.build-mobile-windows: npm run build && npm run prepare-mobile && cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare windows && npm run generate-mobile-assets && cordova build windows && cd ../..
scripts.start-mobile-ios: cd dist/mobile && cordova prepare && cordova emulate ios && cd ../..
